VC.title: Venture Capital
VC.description: If you have an idea and would like to get funded, email projects@diesmo5.com
VC.line: We offer a suite of resources to help you bring your idea to life. (Funds, Software, Mentors, Back-Office, etc.)

Services.title: Services
Services.description: If you are in need of brand or identity services, email clients@diesmo5.com
Services.line: We operate as a full-service business design agency. We'll build websites, design logos, and provide consultation for business strategies.
